title: Doesn't work on my phone

author: Alex G.
comment: It's a fun little watch face.

author: Michael Murphy
comment: Innovation and Dedication all the way! Hopefully those light-loving elves don't show up trying to trade! 10/10 would brew again!

reply.author: Deep Dark
reply.content:
No elves in the planned updates.
Hey, thanks!

title: Needs alcohol to get through the working day...

author: Richard Parker
comment: Don't know whether its just not compatible with my phone or it just doesn't work on my phone, but I can't even find it in my data anywhere. I am a serious DF fan and it offends me that I can't use this app.

reply.author: Deep Dark
reply.content:
I apologize in advance if I misunderstood you, but.. you do have an Android Wear device, right? Lone Brewer works only with Android Wear devices.
In case you've got one, try opening Android Wear app and resyncing - that usually does it.
In case you don't have one - there should be a live wallpaper version soon.
And thank you for the review!

title: Non-functional

author: Kannon Y
comment: Dark background so it's good on AMOLED screens. Overall a good design. Thanks for making this.

reply.author: Deep Dark
reply.content:
I'm glad someone else finds this app to be useful or/and if it gives you a good chuckle.
Cheers!

title: My favorite Android Wear watchface

author: souven ir
comment: It seems to save an .apk file where the wallpaper should be. Can't be installed, it simply gives me another .apk. At no time does the wallpaper show up in my live wallpaper list. :( too bad, seemed cool.

reply.author: Deep Dark
reply.content:
Hello and sorry for the late reply!
Lone Brewer works only with Android Wear devices.
In case you've got one, try opening Android Wear app and resyncing - that usually does it.
